title: 100 Horrors: Tales of Horror in the Blink of an Eye
description: Cruentus Libri Press is proud to present its first horror anthology.100 AUTHORS from the four corners of the globe grace the pages of this anthology with their darkest imaginings.100 STORIES running the gamut of horror from serial killers to the supernatural; from the occult to the ordinary.100 WORDS is all they have to work with, crafting tales of micro-horror with the brevity and intensity of an ice-pick between the eyes.100 HORRORS contains stories from the following world-class Phil Ambler, Sharla Anderson, A.R.
